info.description: Retrieve NetworkConstructs, Fres, Tpes, Equipment, and Equipment Groups
info.title: Inventory Search

tags.name: 000 - nsiapisearch
tags.description: Search inventory resources<p/>    This non-versioned API is meant for use by an end-user as a pass-through to the latest version. WARNING - backwards compatibility is not guaranteed for non-versioned APIs.

get.summary: Retrieves the equipment satisfying the query parameters
get.description: List of equipment returned in JSON format.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: (Optional) List of equipment Ids

parameters.name: searchText
parameters.description: (Optional) The searchable text

parameters.name: searchFields
parameters.description: (Optional) List of comma separated fields to search on. If none are specified, all supported fields are implied. Fields require full path (e.g. data.attributes.siteName). If provided, must also provide searchText parameter

parameters.name: resourceState
parameters.description: (Optional) List of resource states. By default, if no value for this parameter is specified, root and unknown states are filtered out. The allowed values are: root, planned, discovered, plannedAndDiscovered, unknown

parameters.name: networkConstruct.name
parameters.description: (Optional) Network Construct name

parameters.name: networkConstruct.id
parameters.description: (Optional) Network Construct identifier

parameters.name: equipmentExpectations.equipmentIntent.id
parameters.description: (Optional) Equipment Intent Identifier

parameters.name: siteId
parameters.description: (Optional) Site Identifier for equipment

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: (Optional) Comma separated list of equipment states. The allowed values are: IS, OOS, OOS_AU, OOS_MA, OOS_AUMA

parameters.name: displayState
parameters.description: (Optional) List of equipment displayState values. The allowed values are: IS, OOS, OOS-AU, OOS-MA, OOS-AUMA

parameters.name: shelf
parameters.description: (Optional) Comma separated list of equipment shelves

parameters.name: slot
parameters.description: (Optional) Comma separated list of equipment slots

parameters.name: subSlot

parameters.name: subsubSlot
parameters.description: (Optional) Comma separated list of equipment sub-sub-slots

parameters.name: subShelf
parameters.description: (Optional) Comma separated list of equipment sub-shelves

parameters.name: availabilityState
parameters.description: (Optional) List of Equipment availabilityState. The allowed values are: PLANNED, AVAILABLE, UNVALIDATED, INUSE

parameters.name: displayAvailabilityState
parameters.description: (Optional) List of equipment displayAvailabilityState values. The allowed values are: Planned, Unvalidated, Available, In use

parameters.name: reservationState
parameters.description: (Optional) List of Equipment reservationState. The allowed values are: Unknown, Not reserved, Reserved for maintenance, Reserved for facility, Reserved for reversion

parameters.name: maintenanceMode
parameters.description: (Optional) List of Equipment maintenanceMode. The allowed values are: true, false

parameters.name: cardType
parameters.description: (Optional) List of Equipment cardType

parameters.name: specificationMismatch
parameters.description: (Optional) List of Equipment specificationMismatch. The allowed values are: true, false

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: (Optional) List of Equipment category. The allowed values are: rack, shelf, pluggable, standalone

parameters.name: neContactState
parameters.description: (Optional) List of neContactState. The allowed values are: IN, OUT

parameters.name: networkConstruct.macAddress
parameters.description: (Optional) Network Construct macAddress

parameters.name: networkConstruct.subnetName
parameters.description: (Optional) Network Construct subnetName

parameters.name: projectName
parameters.description: (Optional) Project name

parameters.name: startDateMin
parameters.description: (Optional) Minimum value of startDate, format is: yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ

parameters.name: startDateMax
parameters.description: (Optional) Maximum value of startDate, format is: yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ

parameters.name: endDateMin
parameters.description: (Optional) Minimum value of endDate, format is: yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ

parameters.name: endDateMax
parameters.description: (Optional) Maximum value of endDate, format is: yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: (Optional) List of comma separated fields to be included in the response. Fields require full path (i.e. data.attributes.field)

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: (Optional) List of comma separated fields by which to sort the result. Fields require full path (i.e. data.attributes.field). A dash or negative sign before a field indicates descending order; by default ascending order is used

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: (Optional) Offset for current index of data to return

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The size of a returned page

parameters.name: metaDataFields
parameters.description: (Optional) List of meta data to be included. The allowed values are: specificationMismatch, state, availabilityState, reservationState, maintenanceMode, cardType, category, ncMacAddress, ncSubnetName, projectName, displayAvailabilityState, displayState

parameters.name: metaDataQualifiers
parameters.description: (Optional) List of meta data options. The allowed values are: absoluteTotals

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: (Optional) List of comma separated resources to be side-loaded. The allowed values are: expectations, planned, discovered, networkConstructs, equipmentPlanned, equipmentDiscovered

400.description: Invalid value specified for a query parameter, or an invalid query parameter is specified

500.description: Failed to retrieve the requested equipment.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of FREs provided with the satisfying parameters
get.description:
Note: when querying by identifiers, the supported syntax is as follows:
     ?identifierKey=key1,key2,...&identifierValue=value1,value2,...
For instance:
     ?identifierKey=ossLabel&identifierValue=ossLabel

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: (Optional) Comma separated list of FRE identifiers to retrieve

parameters.name: searchText
parameters.description: (Optional) The searchable text, (default search Fields are name, layerRate, tpeLocations if searchFields is not specified.)

parameters.name: searchFields
parameters.description: (Optional) List of comma separated fields to search with, combined with searchText. Fields require full path (i.e. data.attributes.field)

parameters.name: resourceState
parameters.description: (Optional) List of fre planning states. By default, if no value for this parameter is specified, root and unknown states are filtered out. The allowed values are: root, planned, discovered, plannedAndDiscovered, unknown

parameters.name: layerRate
parameters.description: FRE layer rates in comma separated list. The allowed values are: ETHERNET, OTU1, OTU2, OTU2e, OTU3, OTU4, OTUCn, OTSi, OMS, OS, PHY, OTS, FICON, FC, ODU, ODU0, ODU1, ODU2, ODU2e, ODU3, ODU4, ODUCn, DSR, DSR_10GE, DSR_100GE, DSR_ETHERNET, ENCAPSULATION, MPLS, MPLS_PROTECTION, MEDIA, LAG, RS, E1, E3, E1_2M, EC1, DSR_2M, LINE_OC3_STS3_AND_MS_STM1, SECTION_OC3_STS3_AND_RS_STM1, DSR_OC3_STM1, DSR_OC12_STM4, DSR_OC48_STM16, DSR_OC192_STM64, CES_IWF, T1, DSR_1_5M, STS1, STS3C, STS12C, STS24C, STS48C, DS0, DS1, DS3, VT15, VT2, NOT_APPLICABLE, ODUFLEX, OTUg, ODUg, BGP, IP

parameters.name: networkConstruct.id
parameters.description: (Optional) Comma separated Network Construct identifier

parameters.name: networkConstruct.id.operator
parameters.description: (Optional) The logical operator to use when searching Network Construct identifiers

parameters.name: tpe.id
parameters.description: (Optional) Comma separated TPE identifier for endpoints

parameters.name: tpe.id.operator
parameters.description: (Optional) The logical operator to use when searching tpeIds

parameters.name: identifierKey
parameters.description: List of comma separated keys for an identifer object

parameters.name: identifierValue
parameters.description: List of comma separated values for an identifier object

parameters.name: concrete
parameters.description: (Optional) List of concrete FRE identifiers

parameters.name: modelType
parameters.description: (Optional) modelType parameter used to filter results

parameters.name: bookingData.lockout
parameters.description: (Optional)  Flag that enables/disables a link from having additional tunnel BW being consumed

parameters.name: group
parameters.description:
(Optional, Deprecated) FRE group :
  • dwa for all FREs in OTU4 and all top level FREs in ETHERNET, DSR, DSR_ETHERNET, OTSi(OCH), ODU2, ODU4, ODUCn, OTUCn
  • infrastructure for all FRE-APs representing forwarding constructs between ROADM OTS'
  • packet for all L2 nodal and top level FREs in ETHERNET including infrastructure

parameters.name: freType
parameters.description: FRE types in comma separated list The allowed values are: explicitRoute, explicitRouteGroup, snc, sncGroup, explicitRouteInstance

parameters.name: userLabel
parameters.description: User label

parameters.name: managementName
parameters.description: Management Name

parameters.name: freExpectations.serviceIntent.id
parameters.description: (Optional) The service intent Id

parameters.name: freExpectations.equipmentIntent.id
parameters.description: (Optional) The equipment intent Id

parameters.name: freExpectations.intent.id
parameters.description: (Optional) The intent id

parameters.name: freExpectations.intent.type
parameters.description: (Optional) The intent type

parameters.name: signalContentType
parameters.description: (Optional) The identifier indicating type of parent to be returned. If specified, parent matching the criteria will be returned

parameters.name: srlg
parameters.description: (Optional) Find roadmlines by srlg values separated by comma. A roadmline is a FRE between two SAM cards.

parameters.name: roadmLineId
parameters.description: (Optional) Find services configured over a roadmline based on the roadmline FRE identifier.

parameters.name: endpoint.tpe.concrete
parameters.description: Concrete TPE identifier for endpoints

parameters.name: deploymentState
parameters.description: (Optional) deploymentState parameter used to filter results

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: (Optional) The active state of the resource

parameters.name: directionality
parameters.description: (Optional) Indicates if unidirectional or bidirectional FREs should be returned

parameters.name: networkRole
parameters.description: (Optional) Determines if the FRE participates in an internal or external forwarding view or involves access points or connection points

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: FRE types in comma separated list. The allowed values are: service, link, roadmline-ap, roadmline

parameters.name: serviceClass
parameters.description: (Optional) Allow filtering on the FRE service class. This parameter accepts a list of comma separated values. The allowed values are: EVC, ETransit, EAccess, VLAN, TDM, Transport Client, Photonic, Tunnel, IP, LLDP, LAG, OTU, ROADM Line, Fiber, SNC , OSRP Link, OSRP Line, SNCP, ICL, Ring, L3VPN

parameters.name: layerRateQualifier
parameters.description: (Optional) Indicates additional qualification information for a LayerRate. For example, for beyond 100G rates (e.g. OTUCn, ODUCn), defines the n multiplier, or the n-M subrate value.

parameters.name: supportedByFreId
parameters.description: (Optional) Retrieves all supported parent FREs (default is one serviceClass/layer level up) that have a serviceClass designation for the specified FRE Id

parameters.name: supportedByQualifier
parameters.description: (Optional) Used in conjunction with supportedByFreId and controls if only one-level (default) or all parent FREs with a serviceClass are returned

parameters.name: supportingFreId
parameters.description: (Optional) Retrieves all supporting child FREs (one serviceClass/layer level down) that have a serviceClass designation for the specified FRE Id

parameters.name: customerName
parameters.description: (Optional) Search for an exact match on customerName

parameters.name: sncgUserlabel
parameters.description: (Optional) For Control Plane SNCs only: Retrieves all SNCs provided the parent SNCG userLabel

parameters.name: tunnelType
parameters.description: (Optional) Allow filtering on FRE Tunnel class service. This parameter accepts a list of comma separated values: dynamic, static

parameters.name: ringType
parameters.description: (Optional) Allow filtering on type of G8032 ring. This parameter accepts a list of comma separated values: majorRing, subRing

parameters.name: ringCompleteness
parameters.description: (Optional) Allow filtering on type of G8032 ring completeness. This parameter accepts a list of comma separated values: partial, complete

parameters.name: adminState
parameters.description: (Optional) Allow filtering on FRE adminState. This parameter accepts a list of comma separated values: enabled, disabled, not applicable, In Service, Out of Service

parameters.name: operationState
parameters.description: (Optional) Allow filtering on FRE operationState. This parameter accepts a list of comma separated values: fully operating, not operating, degraded operation, Not Applicable, Undetermined, In Service, Degraded, Out of Service External, Out of Service

parameters.name: lqsData.status
parameters.description: (Optional) Allow filtering on the LQS status. This parameter accepts a list of comma separated values

parameters.name: lqsData.margin.valid
parameters.description: (Optional) The LQS margin validity state

parameters.name: lqsData.fiber.reconciled
parameters.description: (Optional) The LQS fiber reconciled state

parameters.name: lqsData.fiber.method
parameters.description: (Optional) Allow filtering on the LQS fiber method. This parameter accepts a list of comma separated values

parameters.name: lqsData.margin.viableAtEol
parameters.description: (Optional) A list of LQS margin viable at EOL states

parameters.name: lqsData.ppg.snrStatus
parameters.description: (Optional) A list of LQS PPG snr states

parameters.name: coroutedFreId
parameters.description: (Optional) Retrieves all correlated FREs that are co-routed and co-terminated with the specified FRE Id

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: (Optional) Allow filtering on FRE tags. This parameter accepts a list of comma separated strings

parameters.name: displayAdminState
parameters.description: (Optional) Allow filtering on FRE adminState display string

parameters.name: displayOperationState
parameters.description: (Optional) Allow filtering on FRE operationState display string

parameters.name: displayTopologySource
parameters.description: (Optional) Allow filtering on FRE topologySource display string

parameters.name: startDateMin
parameters.description: (Optional) Minimum value of startDate, format is: yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ

parameters.name: startDateMax
parameters.description: (Optional) Maximum value of startDate, format is: yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ

parameters.name: endDateMin
parameters.description: (Optional) Minimum value of endDate, format is: yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ

parameters.name: endDateMax
parameters.description: (Optional) Maximum value of endDate, format is: yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ

parameters.name: namedQuery
parameters.description:
(Optional) Comma-separated named query id list; The allowed values are: resiliency, tdmServices, topologicalLinks, roadmLineSpan, reusableSNCG, tunnelReplacement, layer1OtuLinks, photonicSncpWorkLegs, relatedFresFull, relatedFresLight, ringsWithoutConstraints, groupedSNCDTLSET, relatedRoadmlineSeedsForIntent

tunnelReplacement cannot be used in combination with other named queries

photonicSncpWorkLegs can not be used alone, networkConstruct.Id must be provided with this named query

relatedFresFull can not be used alone, namedQueryParam1 must be provided with this named query.

relatedFresLight can not be used alone, namedQueryParam1 must be provided with this named query.

relatedRoadmlineSeedsForIntent can not be used alone, namedQueryParam1 must be provided with this named query

groupedSNCDTLSET cannot be used in combination with other named queries and can not be used alone, namedQueryParam1 must be provided with this named query.

parameters.name: namedQueryParam1
parameters.description: Mandatory when namedQuery relatedFresFull/relatedFresLight/relatedRoadmlineSeedsForIntent is used.

parameters.name: domainTypes
parameters.description: (Optional) Allow filtering on FRE domainTypes. This parameter accepts a list of comma separated values

parameters.name: resilienceLevel
parameters.description: (Optional) Allow filtering on FRE domainTypes. This parameter accepts a list of comma separated values: unprotected, partial, protected

parameters.name: partitionFreIds
parameters.description: (Optional) Retrieves all parent FREs that have the specified FRE as a partition relation

parameters.name: decomposedFreIds
parameters.description: (Optional) Retrieves all parent FREs that have the specified FRE as a decomposed relation

parameters.name: facilityBypass
parameters.description: (Optional) Allow filtering of FRE's with facilityBypass tunnels.

parameters.name: childFreId
parameters.description: (Optional) The child FRE identifier to return its parents

parameters.name: gneSubnetName
parameters.description: (Optional) GNE Subnet name of the FRE

parameters.name: routingConstraints.inclusionConstraints.id
parameters.description: (Optional) Retrieves all FREs that have an inclusion constraint relationship to the specified identifier

parameters.name: displayDeploymentState
parameters.description: (Optional) Allow filtering on FRE deploymentState display string

parameters.name: ncTags
parameters.description: (Optional) List of comma-separated network construct tags that is an endpoint for an FRE

parameters.name: displayRecoveryCharacteristicsOnHome
parameters.description: (Optional) Allow filtering on FRE resiliency controller recovery characteristics onHome display string

parameters.name: remoteOSRPNodeName
parameters.description: (Optional) Allow filtering of DTLSet fres on the basis of destination osrp node name

parameters.name: isUsedByService
parameters.description: (Optional) Allow filtering of DTLSet fres on the basis of whether they are used by snc/sncg or not.Allowed values are true/false

parameters.name: isOtdrCapable
parameters.description: (Optional) List all fres that have OTDR capable links.Allowed value is true

parameters.name: ovpnIds
parameters.description: List of comma separated ovpnIds (0-255)

parameters.name: partitioningFreIds
parameters.description: (Optional) Retrieves all child FREs that have the specified FRE as a partitioning relation

parameters.name: internalStructure
parameters.description: (Optional) Allow filtering on the FRE Internal Structure. This parameter accepts a list of comma separated values. The allowed values are: SIMPLE,SIMPLE_SWITCHED,PROTECTED_ONE_END, MULTI_SIMPLE, MULTIPLE,PROTECTED_BOTH_ENDSMULTIPOINT, HUB_AND_SPOKE,EXPLICIT,INTERCONNECT_ONE_END,UNKNOWN,FULL_MESH,PARTIAL_MESH

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: (Optional) List of comma separated fields to be included in the response. Fields require full path (i.e. data.attributes.field)

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: (Optional) List of comma separated fields by which to sort the result. Fields require full path (i.e. data.attributes.field). A dash or negative sign before a field indicates descending order; by default ascending order is used

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset for the second page

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The size of a returned page

parameters.name: metaDataFields
parameters.description: MetaData to be included. The allowed values are: layerRate, layerRateQualifier, signalContentType, serviceClass, sncgUserlabel, adminState, operationState, lqsData.status, lqsData.margin.valid, lqsData.fiber.reconciled, lqsData.fiber.method, lqsData.margin.viableAtEol, displayAdminState, displayOperationState, displayTopologySource, customerName, domainTypes, resilienceLevel, directionality, displayDeploymentState, ringType, ringCompleteness, displayRecoveryCharacteristicsOnHome, lqsData.ppg.snrStatus

parameters.name: metaDataQualifiers
parameters.description: (Optional) List of meta data options. The allowed values are: absoluteTotals

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: (Optional) List of comma separated resources to be side-loaded. The allowed values are: tpes, expectations, networkConstructs, planned, freDiscovered, frePlanned, supportedByFreResiliencyClientTpes

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of FREs.

400.description: Invalid value specified for a query parameter, or an invalid query parameter is specified.

500.description: Failed to retrieve the FREs with given query parameter.

post.summary: Retrieve a list of FREs provided with the satisfying parameters
post.description:
Note: when querying by identifiers, the supported syntax is as follows: ?identifierKey=key1,key2,...&identifierValue=value1,value2,... For instance: ?identifierKey=ossLabel&identifierValue=ossLabel

Here is an example request:

{
  "layerRate": "OTSi",
  "directionality": "unidirectional",
  "networkRole": "FREAP",
  "type": "service",
  "limit": "50"
}

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: FRE search parameters

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of FREs.

400.description: Invalid value specified for a query parameter, or an invalid query parameter is specified.

500.description: Failed to retrieve the FREs with given query parameter.

parameters.name: freId

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: (Optional) List of comma separated resources to be side-loaded. The allowed values are: fres, tpes, networkConstructs, equipment, expectations, frePlanned, freDiscovered, abstracts, controllers

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: (Optional) List of comma separated fields to be included in the response. Fields require full path (i.e. data.attributes.field)

400.description: Invalid value specified for a query parameter, or an invalid query parameter is specified

404.description: Cannot find the FRE with given Id

500.description: Failed to retrieve FRE with given Id

get.summary: Get list of discovered Network Construct(s) satisfying the query parameters
get.description:
Discovered Network Constructs returned as a JSON list of Network Construct objects. 
Note: When querying using identifiers, the supported syntax is as follows: 
   ?identifierKey=key1,key2,...&identifierValue=value1,value2,... 
For instance, 
   ?identifierKey=subnetName&identifierValue=PV0438A---PV0428D---SUBNET

get.summary: Retrieves the TPEs satisfying the query parameters
get.description:
The following search paths are not supported for the searchFields query parameter:

  • data.attributes.tpeSpec
  • data.attributes.tpeGroupSpecs
  • data.attributes.locations.loc_oid
  • data.attributes.capacityReservations.*
  • data.attributes.syncScopes.*
  • data.relationships.networkConstructAssociation.data.id

Specifying a path for the searchFields parameter of an attribute in the following objects will search the parent object for the value specified in searchText: adjacencyPackage, powerPackage, photonicSpectrumPackage, and signalIndex.

To specify an expectation path for the searchFields parameter use the prefix "data.relationships.tpeExpectations.data.*"

post.description:
Note: when querying by identifiers, the supported syntax is as follows: ?identifierKey=key1,key2,...&identifierValue=value1,value2,... For instance: ?identifierKey=ossLabel&identifierValue=ossLabel

Here is an example request:

{
  "layerRate": "OTSi",
  "directionality": "unidirectional",
  "networkRole": "FREAP",
  "type": "service",
  "limit": "50"
}

adaptsToLayerRateQualifier.description: Provides a means to provide additional qualification attributes for a Layer Rate. For example, for beyond 100G rates OTUCn and ODUCn, the value of n, where n is a multiple of 100. For example, for beyond 100G rates with sub rate potential (i.e. OTUCn-M), this includes the n-M options where n is the number of OxUC overhead instances and M is the number of 5G tributary slots. For example, OTUC4-60 implies 4 instances of OxUC overhead, and 300G capacity (5G x 60).

cardinality.description: Number of possible potential TPEs. Can be a numeric (eg '1', '96', '1000', ...) or can be categorical (eg 'indirect').

clientTpeRulesInOwnLayer.description: Directions of how to instantiate client TPE(s) for this access point, including indirect (client over client) client TPE instantiation.

lifeCycleRules.description: Indicates the life cycle rules for an entity.

regenIdPackage.description: This package stores regen related information.

cascadedDtlTpePackage.description: This package stores cascaded dtl tpe information.

name.description: Name of the AdaptationPool. Unique in the scope of this TPE.

logicalRule.description: Restrict the number of active poolAdapters could be xOR or OR - default is OR

memberAdaptationPools.description: Reference(s) to 0 or more member AdaptationPool-s. Allows for nesting of AdaptationPools.

namingRules.description: Various miscellaneous attributes that do not necessarily belong in the parent resource. Attributes are populated dynamically and therefore cannot be documented here.

name.description: Name of the Adapter. Unique in the scope of this TPE.

adaptsToLayerRateQualifier.description: Provides a means to provide additional qualification attributes for a Layer Rate. For example, for beyond 100G rates OTUCn and ODUCn, the value of n, where n is a multiple of 100. For example, for beyond 100G rates with sub rate potential (i.e. OTUCn-M), this includes the n-M options where n is the number of OxUC overhead instances and M is the number of 5G tributary slots. For example, OTUC4-60 implies 4 instances of OxUC overhead, and 300G capacity (5G x 60).

ttiTx.description: This package stores tti Attribute information.

ttiRx.description: This package stores tti Attribute information.

ttiExpectedRx.description: This package stores tti Attribute information.

pathName.description: The name of this explicit tunnel path

adaptsToLayerRateQualifier.description: Provides a means to provide additional qualification attributes for a Layer Rate. For example, for beyond 100G rates OTUCn and ODUCn, the value of n, where n is a multiple of 100. For example, for beyond 100G rates with sub rate potential (i.e. OTUCn-M), this includes the n-M options where n is the number of OxUC overhead instances and M is the number of 5G tributary slots. For example, OTUC4-60 implies 4 instances of OxUC overhead, and 300G capacity (5G x 60).

enabled.description: True when the particular measurement is enabled

interval.description: The interval between transmitting each message (e.g.: 1)

intervalUnit.description: The unit of interval between transmitting each message (e.g.: seconds)

priority.description: The priority of the messages being transmitted (0-7)

frameSize.description: The frame size of the messages being transmitted (numeric), if applicable to this measurement

repeatDelay.description: The repeat delay of the message being transmitted

count.description: The count of the message being transmitted

iterate.description: The iteration number of the message being transmitted

remoteMepId.description: The ID of the remote MEP

remoteMepMacAddress.description: The MAC address of the remote MEP
